NK001(ka)021:0: thub chog byin rlabs gter mdzod bzhugs so //
NK001(ka)021:1: na mo gu ru sh+aakya mu na ye /
NK001(ka)021:2: . yang mdo ting 'dzin rgyal po las /
NK001(ka)021:3: 'chag dang 'dug dang 'greng dang nyal ba na //
NK001(ka)021:4: mi gang thub pa'i zla ba dran byed pa //
NK001(ka)021:5: . yi mdun na rtag tu ston pa bzhugs //
NK001(ka)021:6: . ni rgya cher mya nga na 'das par 'gyur //
NK001(ka)021:8: sku lus dag ni gser gyi mdog 'dra bas //
NK001(ka)021:9: 'jig rten mgon po kun nas rab tu mdzes //
NK001(ka)021:10: dmigs pa 'di la gang gi sems 'jug pa //
NK001(ka)021:11: byang chub sems dpa' de ni mnyam bzhag yin //
NK001(ka)021:13: bdag cag rnams kyi ston pa mtshungs pa med pa
NK001(ka)021:14: thub pa'i dbang po rjes su dran pa'i rnal 'byor
NK001(ka)021:15: du bya ba ni 'di lta ste /
NK001(ka)021:16: sangs rgyas chos tshogs sogs skyabs sems dang /
NK001(ka)021:17: tshad med bzhi bsgom pa sngon du btang ste /
NK001(ka)021:18: chos thams cad snang la rang bzhin ma grub pa'i don yid la dran pa'i ngang nas /
NK001(ka)021:20: skye med stong pa nyid dang rten 'byung gi //
NK001(ka)021:21: snang ba 'gag med zung 'jug sgyu ma'i tshul //
NK001(ka)021:22: rang mdun nam mkhar mchod sprin rgya mtsho'i dbus //
NK001(ka)021:23: rin chen seng khri pad nyi zla ba'i steng //
NK001(ka)021:24: ston pa mtshungs med sh+aakya seng ge ni //
NK001(ka)021:25: gser gyi mdog can mtshan dang dpe byad ldan //
NK001(ka)021:26: chos gos gsum gsol rdo rje'i skyil krung bzhugs //
NK001(ka)021:27: phyag g.yas sa gnon phyag rgya legs brkyangs shing //
NK001(ka)021:28: phyag g.yon mnyam bzhag bdud rtsi'i lhung bzed bsnams //
NK001(ka)021:29: gser gyi ri ltar gzi brjid dpal 'bar ba //
NK001(ka)021:30: ye shes 'od zer d+r+wa bas mkha' dbyings khyab //
NK001(ka)021:31: nye ba'i sras brgyad gnas brtan bcu drug sogs //
NK001(ka)021:32: 'phags tshogs rgya mtsho'i 'khor gyis yongs bskor zhing //
NK001(ka)021:33: dran pa tsam gyis srid zhi'i mtha' gnyis las //
NK001(ka)021:34: rnam grol bde ba mchog gi dpal stsol ba //
NK001(ka)021:35: skyabs kun 'dus pa'i bdag nyid chen por gsal //
NK001(ka)021:36: zhes de ltar sangs rgyas kyi sku la dmigs te
NK001(ka)021:37: de na dngos su bzhugs yod snyam pa'i sems bskyed
NK001(ka)021:38: ma thag tu / sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes
NK001(ka)021:39: kyi sku la phyogs dang dus gang du yang nye
NK001(ka)021:41: gang du dmigs pa de nyid du nges par bzhugs par 'gyur te /
NK001(ka)021:43: gang zhig sangs rgyas yid byed pa //
NK001(ka)021:44: . yi mdun na de bzhugs te //
NK001(ka)021:45: rtag par byin gyis rlob byed cing //
NK001(ka)021:46: nyes pa kun las rnam par grol //
NK001(ka)021:48: rgyal ba de nyid la dmigs nas tshogs bsags pa
NK001(ka)021:49: yang mi zad pa'i dge rtsa chud mi za ba
NK001(ka)021:50: yin te / phal po che las /
NK001(ka)021:51: rgyal ba de dag thos mthong mchod pa byas pas kyang //
NK001(ka)021:52: tshad med pa yi bsod nams phung po 'phel bar 'gyur //
NK001(ka)021:53: nyon mongs 'khor ba'i sdug basngala thams cad slang gyur du //
NK001(ka)021:54: 'dus byas 'di nang bar ma dor ni zad mi 'gyur //
NK001(ka)021:56: de'i mdun du smon lam ji ltar btab pa yang de bzhin du 'grub ste /
NK001(ka)021:57: 'jam dpal zhing gi yon tan bstan pa las /
NK001(ka)021:58: chos rnams thams cad rkyen bzhin te //
NK001(ka)021:59: 'dun pa'i rtse la rab tu gnas //
NK001(ka)021:60: gang gis smon lam ci btab pa //
NK001(ka)021:62: zhes gsungs pa'i tshul rnams la nges pa brtan po bskyed de /
NK001(ka)021:63: snying rje chen pos rtsod ldan snyigs ma'i zhing //
NK001(ka)021:64: bzung nas smon lam chen po lnga brgya btab //
NK001(ka)021:65: pad dkar ltar basngagasa mtshan thos phyir mi ldog /
NK001(ka)021:66: ston pa thugs rje can la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK001(ka)021:67: bdag gzhan sgo gsum dge tshogs longs spyod bcas //
NK001(ka)021:68: kun bzang mchod pa'i sprin du dmigs nas 'bul ///
NK001(ka)021:69: ga med nas bsags sdig ltung ma lus pa //
NK001(ka)021:70: snying nas 'gyod pa drag pos so sor bshags //
NK001(ka)021:71: 'phags dang so so'i skye bo'i dge ba ni //
NK001(ka)021:72: dus gsum bsags la rjes su yi rang ngo //
NK001(ka)021:73: zab cing rgya che chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul //
NK001(ka)021:74: phyogs bcur rgyun mi 'chad par bskor du gsol //
NK001(ka)021:75: khyed ni nam mkha' lta bu'i ye shes sku //
NK001(ka)021:76: dus gsum 'pho 'gyur med par bzhugs mod kyi //
NK001(ka)021:77: gdul bya'i snang ngor skye 'jig tshul ston kyang //
NK001(ka)021:78: sprul pa'i gzugs sku rtag tu snang bar mdzo. //
NK001(ka)021:79: bdag gis dus gsum bsags pa'i dge tshogs kyis //
NK001(ka)021:80: mkha' khyab 'gro ba kun la phan slad du //
NK001(ka)021:81: chos kyi rgyal po rtag tu mnyes byed cing //
NK001(ka)021:82: chos rje rgyal ba'i go 'phang thob par shog /
NK001(ka)021:83: bdag cag snyigs ma'i 'gro ba mgon med rnams //
NK001(ka)021:84: thugs rjes lhag par bzung ba'i bka' drin las //
NK001(ka)021:85: zhing dang dus 'dir rin chen rnam gsum gyi //
NK001(ka)021:86: snang ba ji snyed khyod kyi phrin las nyid //
NK001(ka)021:87: . phyir skyabs mchog mtshungs med gcig pu ru //
NK001(ka)021:88: yid ches dad pas snying nas gsol 'debs na //
NK001(ka)021:89: }na gyi dam bca' chen po ma bsnyel bar //
NK001(ka)021:90: byang chub bar du thugs rjes dgyes 'dzin mdzo. //
NK001(ka)021:91: ces yid ches kyi dad pa drag pos ston pa
NK001(ka)021:92: dngos su bzhugs yod snyam pa'i sku la rtse gcig
NK001(ka)021:93: tu dmigs te / bla ma ston pa bcom ldan
NK001(ka)021:94: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
NK001(ka)021:95: par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal rgyal ba sh+aakya thub
NK001(ka)021:99: thugs rgyud bskul ba'i tshul du sher phyin yi ge nyung ngu las gsungs pa'i gzungs ni /
NK001(ka)021:101: mu ne mu ne ma h+aa mu na ye s+w+aa h+aa /
NK001(ka)021:104: 'di dag gi skabs su ston pa'i yon tan rjes
NK001(ka)021:105: su dran te dad pa'i sems kyis rtse gcig tu
NK001(ka)021:106: sku yi gsal snang la dmigs nas /
NK001(ka)021:107: mtshan barjoda pa dang gzungs bzlas pa'i- rkyen gyis ston
NK001(ka)021:108: pa'i sku las ye shes kyi 'od zer sna tshogs
NK001(ka)021:109: pa'i snang ba chen pos bdag dang sems can thams
NK001(ka)021:110: cad kyi sgrib pa thams cad bsal zhing //
NK001(ka)021:111: ga pa chen po'i lam gyi yon tan tshul bzhin
NK001(ka)021:112: du skyes te phyir mi ldog pa'i sa non par
NK001(ka)021:113: bsams la de ltar ci nus su brtson par bya
NK001(ka)021:114: / thun mtshams rnams su man+dala sogs mchod pa dang /
NK001(ka)021:119: de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa sogs mdo gang 'dod ci ltar nus par bklag /
NK001(ka)021:120: dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bla med byang chub tu
NK001(ka)021:121: bsngo ba dang smon lam gyis rgyas gdab par bya'o
NK001(ka)021:122: // spyir 'gro 'chag nyal 'dug gi skabs kun tu ston pa nyid ma brjed par dran pa dang /
NK001(ka)021:123: mtshan mo yang ston pa dngos su bzhugs pa'i sku
NK001(ka)021:124: yi 'od kyis phyogs thams cad nyin mo shin tu
NK001(ka)021:125: dwangs pa'i-dus lta bur snang ba'i 'du shes kyi ngang
NK001(ka)021:127: dus rgyun du ston pa nyid kyis sngon ji ltar thugs bskyed pa'i tshul las brtsams te /
NK001(ka)021:128: dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'
NK001(ka)021:129: chen po rnams kyi rnam par thar pa la rjes
NK001(ka)021:130: su gzhol bas byang chub kyi sems rin po che'i
NK001(ka)021:131: dam bca' lhod pa med pa'i ngang nas byang chub
NK001(ka)021:132: sems dapa'i spyod pa spyi dang khyad par zhi lhag
NK001(ka)021:133: gi rnal 'byor la ci nus su brtson par byas
NK001(ka)021:134: pas dal 'byor thob pa don ldan du 'gyur te
NK001(ka)021:135: / bdag cag gi ston pa 'di nyid kyi mtshan
NK001(ka)021:136: thos pa tsam zhig gis rim gyis byang chub chen
NK001(ka)021:137: po'i lam las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba mdo
NK001(ka)021:139: gong du bstan pa'i gzungs 'di las sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung zhing /
NK001(ka)021:140: gzungs 'di rnyed pa'i mthus sh+aakya'i rgyal po nyid sangs rgyas shing /
NK001(ka)021:141: spyan ras gzigs byang chub sems dapa'i mchog tu gyur pa dang /
NK001(ka)021:142: gzungs 'di ni thos pa tsam gyis bsod nams rgya
NK001(ka)021:143: chen po tshogs med par 'thob cing las kyi sgrib
NK001(ka)021:144: pa thams cad byang ba dang /
NK001(ka)021:145: }gas sgrub pa na bgegs ma mchis par grub par
NK001(ka)021:146: 'gyur ro zhes shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
NK001(ka)021:147: pa yi ge nyung du zhes pa de nyid las
NK001(ka)021:148: gsungs shing / bka' gzhan las kyang gzungs 'di lan
NK001(ka)021:149: gcig bzlas pas bskal pa bye ba brgya phrag brgyad
NK001(ka)021:150: khri'i bar du byas pa'i sdig pa thams cad byang
NK001(ka)021:151: bar 'gyur ba sogs phan yon tshad med pa dang
NK001(ka)021:152: gsungs shing / ldan zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa
NK001(ka)021:153: sh+aakya thub pa'i snying po dam pa nyid du gsungs
NK001(ka)021:154: gsungs shing / ldan zhing / so // dad pa
NK001(ka)021:155: bskyed pa dang zhi lhag gi rnal 'byor la ji
NK001(ka)021:156: ltar brtson pa'i tshul zur du bshad par bya'o //
NK001(ka)021:157: zhes pa 'di ni bslab gsum nor bu'i mdzod mnga'
NK001(ka)021:158: dbon rin po che o rgyan bstan 'dzin nor bu
NK001(ka)021:159: nas bkra shis pa'i lha rdzas dang bcas te nan
NK001(ka)021:160: tan bskul ba yid la 'jags pa'i steng du /
NK001(ka)021:161: nye char yang dbon rin po che nyid nas sprul
NK001(ka)021:162: pa'i sku 'jigs med pad+ma bde chen la sbran te
NK001(ka)021:163: rin chen dang po sogs bkra shis pa'i lha rdzas
NK001(ka)021:164: kyi skyes dang bcas myur du grub par gyis zhes
NK001(ka)021:165: dam bzung gis bkas bskul ba la brten nas /
NK001(ka)021:166: ston pa mchog la mi phyed pa'i dad pa thob cing /
NK001(ka)021:167: dus mthar chos smra ba'i ming tsam 'dzin pa sh+aakya'i rjes 'jug mi pham 'jam dbyangs rgya mtshos /
NK001(ka)021:168: rdza rdo rje 'phan phyug gi ri zhol phun tshogs nor bu'i gling du /
NK001(ka)021:169: kun ldan lcags byi gsar tshes cho 'phrul chen po'i
NK001(ka)021:170: zla ba'i yar tshes brgyad la grub par bgyis pa
NK001(ka)021:171: 'dis kyang bstan 'gro la phan pa rmad du byung
NK001(ka)021:172: ba rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa dang /
NK001(ka)021:173: tshul 'di mthong thos dran reg gi 'gro ba rnams
NK001(ka)021:174: kyi rgyud la ston pa'i dbang po'i byin rlabs mtshungs
NK001(ka)021:175: pa med pa mngon du 'jug par gyur cig //
